name: Minister 2.2K
description:
The game was made for the Ludum Dare 44.

The game Minister 2.2K is made to give us xp, gastritis of the cafes and also to reflect a little about the situation that passes our country.

Our country, lives a government of backwardness with corrupt and privileged politicians. However, those who have much, decide the lives of those who have little.

Social security reform is an important issue in many countries, but the situation in our country has become a joke, but no one is laughing.

In the game you will control the Minister who is responsible for retiring (or not) the elderly. In a simulation gameplay, and of course, a little humor.

Ridendo castigat mores.
